SELECT d.id, d.dictdata_name as "dictdataName", d.dictdata_length as "dictdataLength", d.dictdata_number as "dictdataNumber", (select count(*) from project_produce where pro_period=d.id and pro_status=3) as "one", (select sum(e.detail_day) from project_produce p inner join project_road_word_detail e on e.pro_id=p.id where p.pro_status=3 and p.pro_period=d.id and e.detail_type=(select id from dictionary where dict_code='GZL')
and e.create_time like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{beginTime}), '%')
and e.create_time between CONCAT(#{beginTime},' 00:00:00') and CONCAT(#{endTime} ,' 23:59:59')
and e.create_time like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{beginTime}), '%')
) as "oneDay", (select count(*) from project_produce where pro_period=d.id and pro_status=1) as "two", (select sum(e.detail_day) from project_produce p inner join project_road_word_detail e on e.pro_id=p.id where p.pro_status=1 and p.pro_period=d.id and e.detail_type=(select id from dictionary where dict_code='GZL')
and e.create_time like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{beginTime}), '%')
and e.create_time between CONCAT(#{beginTime},' 00:00:00') and CONCAT(#{endTime} ,' 23:59:59')
and e.create_time like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{beginTime}), '%')
) as "twoDay", (select count(*) from project_produce where pro_period=d.id and pro_status=4) as "three", (select sum(e.detail_day) from project_produce p inner join project_road_word_detail e on e.pro_id=p.id where p.pro_status=4 and p.pro_period=d.id and e.detail_type=(select id from dictionary where dict_code='GZL')
and e.create_time like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{beginTime}), '%')
and e.create_time between CONCAT(#{beginTime},' 00:00:00') and CONCAT(#{endTime} ,' 23:59:59')
and e.create_time like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{beginTime}), '%')
) as "threeDay"
FROM dictionarydata d WHERE d.parent_id = ( SELECT id FROM dictionarydata WHERE upper(dictdata_code) = upper(#{code}) and dict_id=(select id from dictionary where dict_code='GCLB') )
and d.id =#{proPeriod}
